subject: Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: Evander Holyfield’s wife, Candi, claims he hit her several times after an argument Feb. 1 about her payments to their church and has received a temporary protective order in Fayetteville, Ga.
snippet: Evander Holyfield’s wife, Candi, claims he hit her several times after an argument Feb. 1 about her payments to their church and has received a temporary protective order in Fayetteville, Ga.
